data.title: Thunderbird Drone Festival Scheduled for August 25
data.meta_description: Description of what this company/site does.
data.text:
Oklahoma’s first and only drone film/photo festival and drone technology event is scheduled for August 25-26th in Woodward, Oklahoma. This gravity-defying experience is in its third year and is an event for the entire family.

Filmmakers and photographers from all over the world will showcase their stunning drone work across a variety of categories in front of an enthusiastic audience. Hand-selected by a professional jury, including Emmy award-winners, the films and photos featured in the festival will leave you in awe. Category winners will receive awards and will celebrate the evening at the VIP after-party and drone light show!

All ages can learn how to fly a drone, check out our FPV drone simulators, and take part in STEM activities to learn about the science of flight.

The weekend will close with the exciting FPV Drone Races at the 2023 Sky-high Shootout. Watch as goggle-wearing drone pilots using Tiny Whoops complete a complicated obstacle course. Cheer on your favorite pilot and see if they have what it takes to be this year’s champion.

Location: Woodward Conference Center

3401 Centennial Lane Woodward, OK 73801

Friday, August 25th

Doors open – 6pm

Film Festival – 7pm

Drone Light Show – 9pm

VIP Afterparty – 9:15pm

DEMO by Helion (for first responders) – 9:30pm

Saturday, August 26th

This Drone Day will consist of various panels, demos, and education for all ages regarding every related to drones and their use in various industries.

Sky High Shout Out Racer check-in – 9am

Doors Open – 9:45am

Welcome – 9:55am

Demos & Break-out Classes – 10am

Panel Discussion – 11am

Lunch - Noon

Keynote Speaker – 12:15pm

Sky High Shootout FPV Racing Finals – 2pm

Drone Day & Festival complete – 3:30pm

Learn more about the event

Purchase tickets

Children 12 and under are free.
